sonam kapur samanga rangapamedi faran aktharta da, adi pahayi angal thunak usa hiyuma kureshita saha adi pahayi angal pahak usa arshad warshita dipika samanga rangapame di da gatalu athi wiya.anuwa dashakaye tharakawan wu madhuri diksith, karishma kapur, kajal, rani mukharji, prithi sintha samanya usakin yuthu wima nisa naluwanta usa pilibanda gatalu mathu nowiya.
ema nisa shri lanka sancharaya kisidu aakarayakin brithanya agramathya dewid kamaran mahathata amathaka nowanu athi.

rajapaksha sahruda sansadaye kriyakarakam pilibandawa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa ha polis mulya aparadha kottashaya parikshana aarambha kara athi athara ehi sabhapathiwaraya lesa katayuthu kara aththe basil rajapaksha hitapu amathiwarayage samipathamayaku wana wili gamage namathi pudgalayaku bawath ehi lekam lesa katayuthu kara aththe priyath bandu wikrama bawath pawase.
angoda lokkata apa matha pamina nidahase jiwath wannata samayan idak dunne natha.

nawa thapalpathige pathwimath samaga thapal karyalawala rathinynya paththu kale naha - thapal sthanadhipathi eekabaddha sanwidhanaya kiyayi nawa thapalpathiwaraya pathwima sambandhawa diwayina pura pihiti kisidu thapal ho upa thapal karyalayaka rathinynya paththu kirimak sidu nowu bawa thapal sthanadhipathiwarunge eekabaddha sanwidhanaya prakasha kara siti.
aranari pasal guruwarunge demala saha aagam danuma wadi diyunu kirime atiyen hama warshayak pasama mema wibhaga pawathwanu labe.
mata denna ran kasi pirawu pettiyak.
